item.title: Cold plasma treatment boosts barley germination and seedling vigor: Insights into soluble sugar, starch, and protein modifications
item.description: arXiv:2405.00702v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: This study investigates the impact of three cold plasma treatments on barley seed germination: direct treatment of dry seeds (DDS), direct treatment of water-soaked seeds (DWS), and indirect treatment of seeds using plasma-activated water (IPAW).
item.dc:creator: Mohamed Ali Benabderrahim, Imen Bettaieb, H\'edia Hannachi, Mokhtar Rejili, Thierry Dufour
